remediation: Upgrade moodle/moodle to version 2.4.1 or higher.
title: Improper Input Validation

vulnDescription.Overview: moodle/moodle is a learning platform. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Input Validation due to improper validation of pathnames in the backup/converter/moodle1/lib.php script. An attacker can read arbitrary files by leveraging the backup-restoration feature. This is only exploitable if the attacker has the ability to restore backups.
